title: 306.31 CEMETERY ASSOCIATION MAY ESTABLISH PERMANENT FUND.
text: A cemetery association formed under the law that has at least three members of a board of trustees or directors that has established and maintains a cemetery of at least one-half acre in area, may, by a two-thirds vote of its trustees or directors taken at a regular meeting of the board, establish a permanent fund for the care, maintenance, and improvement of the cemetery. The fund must be known as the permanent care and improvement fund of the cemetery association.
